author: ctan
msg: [CONTINUUM-2451] update prepared-releases.xml and set releaseId in the ReleasePerform action when doing the release with provide parameters option. releaseId is not set properly so the ReleaseInProgress action doesn't know what release to show and where to retrieve the release information because the prepared-releases.xml was not updated
